name: Witch Hunt (itch) (Rulerjdog)
description:
You are a witch trying to protect your coven from all attackers. You can use Fire, Ice and Earth to attack or for Utility. The goal is to explore the world and fight the evil Ent at the end. Good Luck to those who try.

  • A and D to move
  • Space to jump
  • F to cast Spells
  • Q and E to switch elements
  • K for Utility
